TopicTitle: This guy made a soft piano version of the KSP theme

Articles.Content:
[https://soundcloud.com/emil-persson-12/kerbal-space-piano/s-Gc0ve](https://soundcloud.com/emil-persson-12/kerbal-space-piano/s-Gc0ve)

I think this is beautiful.

Big props to Emil Persson.

Very cool. Thanks for sharing!

I also really liked his Orchestral Tribute of the main KSP theme:

[https://soundcloud.com/emil-persson-12/sets/kerbal-space-program-theme-kit](https://soundcloud.com/emil-persson-12/sets/kerbal-space-program-theme-kit)

Not bad... at all. This would, as PROJECT IZON states on Soundcloud, make a really great song for the credits of KSP.

That being said, I've made some more... original... KSP covers. Throwing my hat in the ring:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Fuz-iKfnU8M?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

"*Lights*" KSP Cover: With almost 300% more snapping than the leading competitor!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/dsltpi6s8QM?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

"*Celtic Jeb*" KSP Cover: With loads of fast violin and stuff! It's actually more bluegrass-y than Celtic, but oh well.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/c33vSJAc1Hk?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

"*Spheres of Legend*" KSP Cover: Extra trippy, because SCIENCE!

...so yeah.

That being said, thanks ShadowZone. I really wish that Emil Persson actually had a KSP forum account, as I would +Rep him as often as possible... ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) His stuff is *cool*.

Thanks guys ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-08T19:04:54Z" title="03/08/2015 07:04  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 8, 2015</time> by igel\_son**

Magnificent. Would be great as end-game music.
